sentences.english: The model_free forming technology speeded up the renewal of enamel products.

sentences.english: It is a new generation product of low voltage switchgear assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 可作为低压成套开关设备的更新换代产品使用。

sentences.english: I plant adhere to the road of scientific and technological innovation, product upgrading.
sentences.chinese: 我厂坚持走科技创新之路，产品不断更新换代。
